tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE preoperative_imaging_data (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    image_url VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL,
    image_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    image_size INT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE imaging_data (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT NOT NULL,
    image_url TEXT NOT NULL,
    imaging_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    imaging_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE navigation_data (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT NOT NULL,
    navigation_session_id INT NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    navigation_mode VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE imaging_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  imaging_type TEXT,
  imaging_date TIMESTAMP,
  image_data BYTEA
)

CREATE TABLE patient_data (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name TEXT,
  patient_age INT,
  patient_gender TEXT,
  patient_height DECIMAL,
  patient_weight DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE surgery_data (
  patient_id INT,
  surgery_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  surgery_date TIMESTAMP,
  surgeon_name TEXT,
  surgery_type TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE navigation_data (
  surgery_id INT,
  navigation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  navigation_type TEXT,
  navigation_date TIMESTAMP,
  navigation_data JSON
)
